title: Configre App With Nanobox
body:
To copy the code used in this video it is probably best to copy from my repo as nanobox may update thier code from time to time.  So we are all on the same page, grab all code from:

NOTE:  Feel free to go ahead with the nanobox setup(registration) as all services we use in the course are free. 

I have a note about this in the deploy section but there is now no need to "scale" your nanobox container when we deploy, feel free to use the default settings when we deploy(This will make more sense in that section).  Please keep this in mind as to scale up will mean you need to pay $10 a month -- Again, no need to pay.   

 

Base app that is cloned in the video: https://github.com/schesnowitz/rails-app

 

App configured to use Nanobox: https://github.com/schesnowitz/my-website/tree/nanobox

title: Kill The Server
body:
To kill your rails server:

1. Open a new terminal

2. "nanobox run"

3. go inside the tmp folder and look in pids open server.pid (you may need to refresh to see a file) open file

4. in the new nanobox terminal type kill -9 xxxx (xxxx = the number you see in the server.pid file)

 

If that fails, stop nanobox "nanobox stop" and then run "nanobox run" to get things rolling again.

title: Welcome
body:
Hello, and welcome to Rails For Beginners  

I have tried to make the resources used in the course available here.  If I have overlooked any, please reach out to me and I will add content as needed.

If you want to join our group on Facebook http://www.facebook.com/groups/1722657984689508/

I really hope you enjoy the course and I appreciate any feedback as it helps me improve the content as things get updated.

Thanks so much for taking this course and I think you will find it helpful on your Ruby on Rails journey!

 

all the best -Steve

steve@chesnowitz.com

title: No Need To Scale
body:
Just a couple of weeks after recording, Digital Ocean boosted the performance on all their droplets and so there is no need to "scale up" to the $10 version as I do in the upcoming video.  Feel free to leave the droplet set to the $5 version and you should be good to go.
